text: machine learning is a foundational skill
for students researchers and data
scientists they need hands-on experience
but are hindered by the complexity of
setting up the right configuration and
the costs involved
amazon sagemaker studio lab enables data
scientists of all skill levels to
quickly experiment with machine learning
tools frameworks and libraries to get
started register for a sagemaker studio
lab account with a valid email this is
not an aws account and since it's
completely free it doesn't require a
credit card
next open a jupyter-based notebook
development environment and choose
between cpu or gpu you can switch at any
time
sagemaker studio lab provides a
pre-packaged ml framework with
flexibility to customize libraries
with dedicated storage you can save your
work and pick up where you left off and
when you're ready for a more robust
environment it's easy to migrate to
amazon sagemaker studio start
experimenting with your machine learning
projects today with amazon sage maker
studio lab
